ServicesBannerData.bannerDescription:
Particular Branding is where stories find their visual voice and sense of feeling.

 We listen, we create, and we define your brand's essence. Crafting distinctive 
 identities that resonate and endure.

ServiceAboutInfoData.ServiceSecDesc1: At Particular, we believe that every brand is as unique as a fingerprint, and your branding deserves nothing less than a tailored approach. Branding is not just about aesthetics; it's about conveying your brand's story, values, and purpose.
ServiceAboutInfoData.ServiceSecDesc2: Change is constant in the business world. Your brand should reflect your growth, evolution, and shifting market dynamics. At Particular, our branding strategies are dynamic and flexible. We're here to adjust and refine your brand identity to keep it in sync with your journey.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: What do I need for ‘branding’? I don’t really know what goes into it.
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Branding is a comprehensive process that involves creating a strong and distinctive identity for your business. It goes beyond just a logo and includes various elements that work together to establish your brand's image and reputation. This includes your brand’s strategy, identity, its messaging, its tagline or slogan, website and online presence, content strategy, marketing materials, its customer experience and across-the-board consistency.Ultimately, to build a relatively complete brand, all of the above will be a part of the final picture. Starting with an idea of your customer experience, a website and online presence, a logo mark and some marketing materials will be enough to start making money. The vast world of continued brand development awaits you after that foundation, and many brand will redesign their logos, amend their slogans and refine their messaging over time.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: I have a brand but want to make it more concise. Can you help?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Yes. Brand development continually occurs throughout a company’s journey, so it never really ends. Particular Agency helps both create new brand visually

FaqPageAccodionData.question: How many revisions do I get for my logo mark?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: 3 revisions. Before the project starts you will be given a logo brief to provide our design team with, which will help shape their understanding of your ideas.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: What’s the difference between a logo mark and logo type
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: A logo mark, often referred to as an emblem or symbol, is a graphic or visual element within a logo that represents the brand or company. It is a unique and recognizable symbol that doesn't necessarily include any text or the company's name. A logo type is a logo that consists solely of the company's name or a specific typographic treatment of the brand's name. It does not include a separate graphic or symbol.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: What’s a Brand Identity Kit?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: A Brand Identity Kit, also referred to as a Brand Banner, works as the effective manual for all things that concern the brand. This includes Brand logo mark, logo type, tone, personality, essence, market positioning, etc. It serves primarily as a visual representation of the brand in all formats, including placement.

FaqPageAccodionData.question: Can you work on my both brand and website at the same time?
FaqPageAccodionData.answer: Yes. Many of our clients ask for us to work on both their website and brand development at the same time. A popular combination is a website, logo mark and logo type. Other companies opt for a website and full brand identity kit, along with other Particular services.The choice is completely up to the company in question.

services.title: Brand Identity and Positioning
services.description: Designed to define and elevate your brand's essence. We delve deep into your unique story, values, and aspirations to create a compelling brand identity that sets you apart. Particular help craft strategic brand positioning that resonates with your target audience, ensuring your brand stands out in a crowded marketplace.

services.title: Logo Design and Asset Creation
services.description: Your logo is a visual cornerstone of your brand. Working closely with you we design a logo that encapsulates your brand's personality and values. Beyond the logo, we create a suite of brand assets, including imagery, email templates,  icons, and graphics, ensuring a cohesive and impactful brand presence across all touchpoints.

services.title: Brand Guidelines
services.description: Consistency is key to building a strong brand. We document your brand's visual elements, typography, color palettes, and usage guidelines. These guidelines serve as a reference for your team and partners, ensuring that every brand interaction adheres to your unique identity and resonates with your audience.

ServicesProcessData.ProcessStepFeaturedDesc: Outline your objectives in as much detail as possible - unrealistic desires and long-term goals included - so that we gain a complete idea of the field you’ll be competing in.

It’s important that you understand exactly why we follow the steps we do and how they’re likely to lead to you succeeding in line with or beyond your KPIs.
